column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Danting - Thank you for your great review. We appreciate your kind words and understanding regarding our Bok Choy outage. Oftentimes our produce suppliers run out of inventory
column2: which leaves us in the lurch. But we're always trying our hardest to stay on top of these things. Thank you again
column3: and we hope you'll visit again soon.
